alert.note: Alert for Alaska Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 10:00AM AKDT until March 17 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibilities reduced to one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Alaska Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions due to significantly reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers, heavy at times, will persist through the afternoon hours, then diminish this evening. Visibility will fluctuate up and down over short periods of time due to variability in shower and wind intensity.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
